name: heyform
description: HeyForm is an open source form builder and survey platform. It provides a modern drag and drop interface, logic rules and response analytics, suitable for contact forms, feedback and lead collection in self hosted environments.

features.title: Conditional Logic
features.description: Show or hide questions based on previous answers for dynamic forms

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View submission data with charts, graphs, and export capabilities

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Support for text, multiple choice, file uploads, ratings, and more

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive email alerts when new responses are submitted

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Download responses as CSV or Excel for further analysis
